typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		Category as string,
		Rating as string,
		RunTimeMin as integer,
		ReleaseDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> VanarsdelMovieSr
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		OnlineMovieID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> VanarsdelMovieMap
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		Category as string,
		Rating as string,
		RunTimeMin as short,
		ReleaseDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FourthCoffeeMovieSr
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		OnlineMovieID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FourthCoffeeMovieMap
source(output(
		MovieActorID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		ActorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> VanarsdelMoveActors
source(output(
		ActorID as string,
		ActorName as string,
		Gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> VanarsdelActorsSr
source(output(
		MovieActorID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		ActorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FourthCoffeeMovieActorsSr
source(output(
		ActorID as string,
		ActorName as string,
		Gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FourthCoffeeActorsSr
VanarsdelMovieSr, VanarsdelMovieMap join(VanarsdelMovieSr@MovieID == VanarsdelMovieMap@MovieID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		MovieID = VanarsdelMovieSr@MovieID,
		MovieTitle,
		Category,
		Rating,
		RunTimeMin,
		ReleaseDate,
		OnlineMovieID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
FourthCoffeeMovieSr, FourthCoffeeMovieMap join(FourthCoffeeMovieSr@MovieID == FourthCoffeeMovieMap@MovieID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		MovieID = FourthCoffeeMovieSr@MovieID,
		MovieTitle,
		Category,
		Rating,
		RunTimeMin,
		ReleaseDate,
		OnlineMovieID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
VanarsdelMoveActors, VanarsdelMovieMap join(VanarsdelMoveActors@MovieID == VanarsdelMovieMap@MovieID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join3
Join3 select(mapColumn(
		MovieActorID,
		MovieID = VanarsdelMoveActors@MovieID,
		ActorID,
		OnlineMovieID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3, VanarsdelActorsSr join(Select3@ActorID == VanarsdelActorsSr@ActorID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join4
Join4 select(mapColumn(
		MovieActorID,
		MovieID,
		ActorID = Select3@ActorID,
		OnlineMovieID,
		ActorName,
		Gender
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
Select4 derive(SourceSystemId = 3) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn2, DerivedColumn3 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Select1 derive(SourceSystemId = 3,
		ReleaseDate = toDate(ReleaseDate, "MM-dd-yyyy")) ~> DerivedColumn2
Select2 derive(SourceSystemId = 2,
		ReleaseDate = toDate(ReleaseDate, "MM-dd-yyyy")) ~> DerivedColumn3
FourthCoffeeMovieActorsSr, FourthCoffeeMovieMap join(FourthCoffeeMovieActorsSr@MovieID == FourthCoffeeMovieMap@MovieID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join5
Join5 select(mapColumn(
		MovieActorID,
		MovieID = FourthCoffeeMovieActorsSr@MovieID,
		ActorID,
		OnlineMovieID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select5
Select5, FourthCoffeeActorsSr join(Select5@ActorID == FourthCoffeeActorsSr@ActorID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join6
Join6 select(mapColumn(
		MovieActorID,
		MovieID,
		ActorID = Select5@ActorID,
		OnlineMovieID,
		ActorName,
		Gender
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select6
Select6 derive(SourceSystemId = 2) ~> DerivedColumn4
DerivedColumn1, DerivedColumn4 union(byName: true)~> Union2
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['combinedOnPremiseMovies'],
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
Union2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['combinedMovieActors'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
